text:
TIRUNELVELI

Nellai Kamban Kazhagam: Kambaramayanam discourse, Sri Ramasamy Temple, Palayamkottai, 6 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, Government Higher Secondary School, opposite Rathna Theatre, S.N. High Road, 7 p.m.

KALLIDAIKURICHI

Rotary International District 3212: District seminar on ‘Basic education and literacy,’ J. Navamani, District Governor, RID 3212, inaugurates, N. Asoka, Zonal Literacy Chair, Zone 5, chief guest, V. Bharathi, Head, Department of Commerce, Ambai Arts College, Ambasamudram, guest speaker, Town Panchayat Marriage Hall, 10 a.m.

PULIYANGUDI

Rotary Club of Puliyangudi: ‘Pongal’ celebrations and felicitation function to honour environmentalist and Rotarian P.S. Sankaranarayanan, Rotary Hall, Rotary Nagar, 6.31 p.m.

GOVINDAPERI

District Science Centre, Max Jones Trust and Child Line: Science camp for rural development and screening of villagers for eye defects, ortho complications and cancer, P.G. Rajendran, MLA, Alangulam constituency, presides, K. Navaram, District Science Officer, Tirunelveli, chief guest, Gnanam Marava Middle School, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.

VIZHUNTHAYAMBALAM

St. Antony’s Church: Annual festival, third day celebrations, first Holy Communion and Confirmation Holy Mass by Rt. Rev. Jerome Das, Bishop of Kuzhithurai Diocese, 8 a.m., rosary and novena, 6 p.m., Holy Mass by Rev. Fr. V. Maria Alphonse, Vicar General, Kuzhithurai Diocese, homily by Rev. Fr. Oyzlin Xavier, parish priest, Sentharai, church premises, 6.30 p.m.
title: Engagements
